评论概述: Surprising fit for a very inexpensive vest suit
评论详情: This is the best fitting suit my husband has tried on that doesn’t have to be specially tailored…only need hemming. The waist is a tad big, but a belt can fix that. Usually pants that fit his thighs have a waist two times this size and then would have to be altered.  This set is well made…well tailored…and the fabric is a good quality.  For reference: hips 43”, upper thigh 27.5” and waist 39”

Nice satiny material. Elegant and trendy design.

This is an absolutely beautiful suit. The material is so soft and silky and drapes very nicely when on. The waistband has elastic in it, so it doesn't dig in and is very comfortable. It's extremely well made, and the stitching looks perfect. It comes with a satin matching bowtie that has a hook and is adjustable.  The pant legs are a little long, and they will have to be hemmed up, but well worth it to do so. Overall it's a gorgeous quality suit that looks great and is comfortable. I would definitely recommend it.

The pant size was great, however, there's a disconnect between the sizes of pants and vest. The vest would be on the larger side though it is meant for medium. My son loves it and I'm going for number 2 soon.
